name: Ultimate Battle
description:
A game full of action and lots, lots of fun.
Play numerous maps together with your friends or alone against bots. Test yourself on numerous maps and win, becoming the best ever.

Choose the character, the map and get into action, dominate the ranking and beat everyone.

The main mode is all against all up to 6 real players and up to 8 against bots. You will be able to overtake the others
Within the game you survive, collecting weapons, medikit, ammunition and much more.


New maps, characters and weapons, soon to arrive.

Stay tuned
